item.title: Steve Jobs was so dreaded by his employees that they wouldn’t even step into the elevator with him. However, when his secretary was late for work due to car problems, the Apple co-founder didn’t fire her; instead, he handed her the keys to a brand-new Jagu - Luxurylaunches
